backend/main.mo: Defines user, partner, service, subscription, request, and task types for the backend actor, supporting role management and service operations.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features with associated files, components, test IDs, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains human‑written summaries of various frontend files for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Defines global OKLCH color variables, dark mode mappings, and base Tailwind layer styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point with SEO metadata and script loader for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the app’s router, role‑protected dashboard routes, and theme provider.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminSumma: Displays dashboard summary cards for key metrics using mock data placeholders.
frontend/src/components/admin/AsistenmuM: Provides a form to assign Asistenmu roles and shows a table of current assistants using mock data.
frontend/src/components/admin/ClientsTab: Shows client statistics and a searchable table of clients, all based on mock data.
frontend/src/components/admin/LayananTab: Manages subscription records with tabs for listing and creating/editing subscriptions.
frontend/src/components/admin/PendingPar: Displays pending and active partner lists with approve/reject actions, using mock data.
frontend/src/components/admin/ReadOnlyPl: Shows a locked read-only placeholder panel indicating a feature under development.
frontend/src/components/admin/Subscripti: Form component for creating and editing subscriptions with validation, identity lookups, and mutation handling.
Displays a paginated, filterable table of subscriptions with options to create or edit entries.
frontend/src/components/asistenmu/Asiste: Shows completed Asistenmu requests with final report details.
Displays newly created incoming requests with creation date and optional deadline.
Lists tasks currently being worked on by partners, showing basic request and partner info.
Manages QA requests, allowing Asistenmu to request revisions or mark tasks as complete.
Shows tasks rejected by partners along with rejection reasons.
frontend/src/components/asistenmu/Partne: UI for assigning new client requests to partners, including search, selection, and submission of task details.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity with retry logic for existing sessions.
frontend/src/components/client/clientIds: Generates a stable client ID from a principal ID using a simple hash and fixed format.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientPro: Displays and edits client profile info, shows client IDs, and handles profile updates and copy actions.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientReq: Renders summarized counts of client requests by status with icon-based cards.
frontend/src/components/client/Collapsib: Reusable collapsible card component that toggles visibility of its content.
frontend/src/components/MasukButton.tsx: Localized login button using Internet Identity with retry and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/partner/PartnerA: Shows partner’s active in‑progress tasks and allows sending QA requests.
frontend/src/components/partner/PartnerC: Lists completed partner tasks with final report details and status indicators.
frontend/src/components/partner/PartnerE: Displays partner earnings summary and detailed earnings history for completed tasks.
frontend/src/components/partner/PartnerN: Displays new work offers for partners, enabling them to accept or reject tasks with confirmation and reason input.
frontend/src/components/partner/PartnerR: Shows a partner’s rejected tasks along with rejection statistics and detailed reasons for each rejected request.
Lists tasks that require revisions from the partner, including revision notes from Asistenmu.
frontend/src/components/requests/Asisten: Empty file with no implemented content.
Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/requests/ClientC: Form for clients to create requests, selecting subscriptions, entering details, and submitting to backend with validation.
frontend/src/components/requests/ClientR: Organizes client requests into status-based tabs and renders lists for each state using RequestListState.
Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/requests/Request: Utility component that handles loading, empty, error, and render states for request lists.
frontend/src/components/RoleResolutionEr: UI component showing an error state when a user's role cannot be resolved, with retry and home actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider to manage Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state, login, and logout utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profile, roles, and service data using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useRequests.ts: Implements React Query hooks for managing request-related operations such as fetching, creating, searching partners, and assigning tasks.
frontend/src/hooks/useSafeActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity, reinitializing on identity changes and handling optional admin setup.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind-based global styles, color variables, dark mode settings, and shared UI component styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AccessDeniedPage.tsx: Displays an access denied message with a styled card and a button to return to the home page.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Renders the admin dashboard, enforcing authentication and showing profile data, header, and multiple management tabs.
frontend/src/pages/AsistenmuDashboardPag: Renders the Asistenmu dashboard with tabs for request states and handles profile loading and logout.
frontend/src/pages/ClientDashboardPage.t: Displays the client dashboard with profile, subscription summary, request creation, and request lists, including logout handling.
frontend/src/pages/ClientRegistrationPag: Empty placeholder page for client registration.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page with navigation, hero section, auto-redirect on login, and marketing content.
frontend/src/pages/PartnerApplyPage.tsx: Provides a partner application form with validation and submission, showing a success screen after registration.
Renders the partner dashboard with profile stats and tabs for task states, including logout handling.
frontend/src/routes/RequireDomainRole.ts: Route guard that checks authentication and domain role, redirecting or showing loading/error states accordingly.
frontend/src/routes/RoleRouter.tsx: Handles identity and domain-role resolution, redirecting users to role-specific dashboards or showing error/no-role states.
frontend/src/utils/principals.ts: Provides validation, normalization, and format-checking utilities for Dfinity Principal IDs.
frontend/src/utils/time.ts: Converts bigint nanosecond timestamps to Date objects and provides formatting helpers for display and input.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, including session-backed storage and hash parsing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration extending theme colors, radii, shadows, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing the current workflow, role behaviors, UI structure, and known issues across the system.
